junit.runner
Class Differencer

java.lang.Object
  junit.runner.Differencer
Direct Known Subclasses:
UnixShellDifferencer
public abstract class Differencer
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract template for file differencing modules, used by SelectionResultPrinter. Allows dynamic selection of the differencing method.

Author:
Alex Kinneer

Method Detail

diff

public abstract boolean diff(java.lang.String fName,
                             java.lang.String compDir)
Diff two files and return true if they are different.

Parameters:
fName - Name of the file to be diffed.
compDir - Path to directory containing the other file of the same name against which fName will be diffed.
Returns:
true if the files are different, false otherwise.

diff

public boolean diff(java.lang.String fName)
             throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Diff two files and return true if they are different, using internal information to determine the location of the file to be diffed against.

Generally speaking, it is expected that the target path of files to be diffed against will be stored internally and set by a constructor. This is a convenience implementation for situations were the target of the differencing is expected to remain constant.

Subclasses not wishing to provide an implementation are not required to override this method. The default implementation throws an UnsupportedOperationException.

Parameters:
fName - Name of the file to be diffed.
Returns:
true if the files are different, false otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If this differencer does not implement this method.
